short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Creates a keyboard shortcut (Alt + Shift + P) to toggle the pinned state of the currently selected tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TabPin will help you to Pin your tab with the help of Keyboard Shortcut (Alt + Shift + P). This extension will make easier for you to toggle the pinned state of the currently selected tab
